com.db.chart.view

Class Tooltip

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.RelativeLayout
          • com.db.chart.view.Tooltip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class Tooltip
extends android.widget.RelativeLayout
    Class representing chart's tooltips. It works basically as a wrapper.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public void prepare(android.graphics.Rect rect,
                    float value)
        Method called by ChartView before displaying the tooltip in order to set its layout parameters.
        Parameters:
        rect - Rect covering the are of the clicked ChartEntry.
        value - Value of the entry.

      • setHorizontalAlignment

        public Tooltip setHorizontalAlignment(Tooltip.Alignment alignment)
        Define the horizontal alignment of tooltip wrt entry's position. Ex. Alignment.LEFT_RIGHT means that the left side of the tooltip will be aligned with the right side of the entry.
        Parameters:
        alignment - horizontal alignment wrt entry's position.
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setVerticalAlignment

        public Tooltip setVerticalAlignment(Tooltip.Alignment alignment)
        Define the vertical alignment of tooltip wrt entry's position. Ex. Alignment.TOP_TOP means that the top side of the tooltip will be aligned with the top side of the entry.
        Parameters:
        alignment - vertical alignment wrt entry's position.
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setDimensions

        public Tooltip setDimensions(int width,
                             int height)
        Set the dimensions of the tooltip.
        Parameters:
        width - width dimension
        height - height dimension
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setMargins

        public Tooltip setMargins(int left,
                          int top,
                          int right,
                          int bottom)
        Set the margins of the tooltip wrt entry.
        Parameters:
        left - left margin dimension.
        top - top margin dimension.
        right - right margin dimension.
        bottom - bottom margin dimension.
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.

      • setValueFormat

        public Tooltip setValueFormat(java.text.DecimalFormat format)
        Set the format to be applied to tooltip's value.
        Parameters:
        format - value format to be used once the tooltip is displayed.
        Returns:
        Tooltip self-reference.
